Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Deku Shield#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Bombchus (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Haunted Wasteland torches# reveal #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #5# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #the Shadow Medallion#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
